statements: SELECT * FROM RecipeTracking;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM RecipeTracking WHERE cooking_time < 30;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_temperature FROM RecipeTracking WHERE recipe_id = 3;
SELECT recipe_name FROM RecipeTracking ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecipeTracking WHERE cooking_temperature > 400 AND cooking_time < 60;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, cooking_time, cooking_temperature FROM RecipeTracking WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RecipeTracking WHERE cooking_time > 30 ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_temperature FROM RecipeTracking WHERE cooking_temperature BETWEEN 300 AND 400;
SELECT * FROM RecipeTracking ORDER BY cooking_time, recipe_name;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM RecipeTracking WHERE cooking_temperature = 350 AND cooking_time < 60;
SELECT recipe_name, cook_time FROM recipe WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recipe WHERE cook_temperature > 350;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM ingredient WHERE recipe_id = 2;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, cook_temperature FROM recipe WHERE cook_time < 30;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM ingredient ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, cook_time, cook_temperature FROM recipe WHERE cook_time > 30;
SELECT recipe_name, cook_time, cook_temperature FROM recipe WHERE cook_time < 60 ORDER BY cook_time ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM recipe INNER JOIN ingredient ON recipe.recipe_id = ingredient.recipe_id;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM recipe INNER JOIN ingredient ON recipe.recipe_id = ingredient.recipe_id WHERE quantity >= 2.5;
SELECT recipe_name, cook_temperature, AVG(cook_time) AS average_cook_time FROM recipe GROUP BY cook_temperature;
SELECT * FROM Recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM Recipe;
SELECT * FROM Ingredient WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT ingredient_name FROM Ingredient WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_duration FROM Recipe WHERE cooking_temperature > 350;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM Recipe WHERE cooking_temperature > 350;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time, cooking_temperature FROM Recipe WHERE cooking_time <= '1 hour';
SELECT * FROM Ingredient WHERE quantity > 10 AND quantity < 20;
SELECT recipe_name, step_description, step_duration FROM Recipe INNER JOIN RecipeSteps ON Recipe.recipe_id = RecipeSteps.recipe_id;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time, ingredient_name, quantity FROM Recipe INNER JOIN Ingredient ON Recipe.recipe_id = Ingredient.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time_minutes FROM recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_temperature_degrees FROM recipe WHERE cooking_time_minutes < 30;
SELECT * FROM ingredient;
SELECT ingredient_name FROM ingredient WHERE ingredient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time_minutes FROM recipe WHERE cooking_time_minutes > 30;
SELECT ingredient_name FROM ingredient WHERE ingredient_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time_minutes, ingredient_name FROM recipe JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipe.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id JOIN ingredient ON recipe_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredient.ingredient_id WHERE ingredient_name = 'Salt';
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_start_time, cooking_end_time FROM cooking_session WHERE cooking_start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM Recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM Recipe;
SELECT ingredient_name, amount, units FROM Ingredient;
SELECT cook_name, experience_level FROM Cook;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time, cooking_temperature FROM Recipe;
SELECT * FROM Recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM Recipe WHERE cooking_time > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT cook_name FROM CookedRecipes;

SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, amount, units FROM Recipe JOIN RecipeIngredients ON Recipe.recipe_id = RecipeIngredients.recipe_id JOIN Ingredient ON RecipeIngredients.ingredient_id = Ingredient.ingredient_id;
SELECT cook_name, recipe_name, date_cooked FROM Cook JOIN CookedRecipes ON Cook.cook_id = CookedRecipes.cook_id JOIN Recipe ON CookedRecipes.recipe_id = Recipe.recipe_id ORDER BY date_cooked DESC;
